title: Wrong Free Champions
body:
Hello guys

So I made a smurf account the other day and none of the champions Rito said was free weren't playable on my lvl 4 smurf... wtf

replies.body: Any account below level 6 has a set pool of free champs that doesn't change that is different from the free week champs that you are referring to. From memory some of the champs in that set are Ashe, Katarina and Darius.
low level accounts have different free champs. the only one that's wrong here is you.
i think up until lvl 6 or 8 you have a default champ pool for noobs
I see. So I can't play urgot then.
